---
title: Analyzing the bikeways Utah data
subtitle: Comparing the bikeways by type and against the highway mileage
description: Lorem Ipsum
author:
 - name: Pukar Bhandari
   email: pukar.bhandari@wfrc.utah.gov
   affiliation:
     - name: Wasatch Front Regional Council
       url: "https://wfrc.utah.gov/"
date: "2025-11-16"
---

# Setup Environment

## Install Packages

```r
install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("sf")
install.packages("arcgislayers")
install.packages("janitor")
install.packages("tmap")
```

## Load Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dplyr)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```

Attaching package: 'dplyr'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    filter, lag
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
The following objects are masked from 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(sf)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Linking to GEOS 3.13.1, GDAL 3.11.0, PROJ 9.6.0; sf_use_s2() is TRUE
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(arcgislayers)
library(janitor)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```

Attaching package: 'janitor'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    chisq.test, fisher.test
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tmap)
```
:::


## Environment Variables


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
PROJECT_CRS = "EPSG:3566"

tmap::tmap_mode("view")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
ℹ tmap modes "plot" - "view"
ℹ toggle with `tmap::ttm()`
```


:::
:::


# Read Data from UGRC

## State of Utah


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sf_ut_bound = arcgislayers::arc_read(
    "https://services1.arcgis.com/99lidPhWCzftIe9K/ArcGIS/rest/services/UtahStateBoundary/FeatureServer/0",
    crs = PROJECT_CRS
) |>
    janitor::clean_names()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Registered S3 method overwritten by 'jsonify':
  method     from    
  print.json jsonlite
```


:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap::qtm(sf_ut_bound)
```
:::


## Utah City Boundaries


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sf_ut_cities = arcgislayers::arc_read(
    "https://services1.arcgis.com/99lidPhWCzftIe9K/ArcGIS/rest/services/UtahMunicipalBoundaries/FeatureServer/0",
    crs = PROJECT_CRS
) |>
    janitor::clean_names()
```
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap::qtm(sf_ut_cities)
```
:::


## Utah Roadways


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sf_ut_roadways = arcgislayers::arc_read(
    "https://services1.arcgis.com/99lidPhWCzftIe9K/ArcGIS/rest/services/UtahRoads/FeatureServer/0",
    crs = PROJECT_CRS
) |>
    janitor::clean_names()
```

## Utah Bikeways


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sf_ut_bikeways = arcgislayers::arc_read(
    "https://services1.arcgis.com/99lidPhWCzftIe9K/ArcGIS/rest/services/Bikeways/FeatureServer/0",
    crs = PROJECT_CRS
) |>
    janitor::clean_names()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
[working] (35 + 0) -> 10 -> 6 | ■■■■■                             12%
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap::qtm(sf_ut_bikeways)
```
:::
